thread.title: Jose Garcia, Jr
thread.title_full: OLDIES.com reviewed by Jose Garcia, Jr

author: Jose Garcia, Jr
title: Jose Garcia, Jr
text:
This was my first time purchasing DVDs from your establishment and, I must say, the service was on point! I received my order promptly and EXACTLY as advertised.
I look forward to my continued business with oldies.com, as I am looking to build my Blu-Ray collection with plenty of both new and old.
Keep up the great work!!
